short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your twitter with Star vs. the Forces of Evil theme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your Twitter experience with the "SVTFOE Twitter" Chrome extension! Choose from a selection of charming icons and backgrounds inspired by the beloved series "Star vs. The Forces of Evil". Add a touch of magic to your Twitter profile and show your love for SVTFOE characters like Star Butterfly and Marco Diaz. Download now!
